title: And we're going. 4. To Toledo = I ya vamos. 4. A Toledo
creator_credit: Joshua Tree Productions and Holt, Rinehart and Winston
brief_description: A Spanish language film. Provides some cultural background of Spain and points out to the students the difference between Spanish spoken by Spanish Americans and Spanish spoken in Spain.
